title: Blogging using React & Appwrite
features: Architected a responsive React SPA for blogging, integrating Appwrite’s authentication, real‑time database, and storage to enable seamless content creation and publishing.
Implemented a modular component system with hooks and context, reducing code duplication and enhancing maintainability across the front‑end architecture.
Configured Appwrite’s role‑based access control and custom JWT validation to secure data flow and protect user information end‑to‑end.
